author: gmazza
msg: Switching folder structure of Apache CMS site per Infra request (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/INFRA-5631?focusedCommentId=13547018&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-13547018)

author: kkolinko
msg: Fix release of processors in AjpNioProtocol. Wrong object was used as a key in the connections map.
"connections" is "Map<S,Processor<S>>". The key in the map is socket, not its wrapper.
Found this in a review inspired by a similar fix in r1426662.
(r1426662 itself is specific to Tomcat 8 and does not need a backport).

author: kkolinko
msg: Fix release of processors in AjpNioProtocol. Wrong object was used as a key in the connections map.
"connections" is "Map<S,Processor<S>>", so the key in the map is socket, not its wrapper.
Found this in a review inspired by a similar fix in r1426662.

author: rmannibucau
msg: reviewing Message class - making it lazy since that's mainly for errors (so no in optimal case)+ using concurrenthashmap to avoid synchronization + hashtable

msg: avoiding to create multiple configfactory + using ContextHandler without need of proxy in BeanContext
